About Me

A few things about me...

Bio

Computer Science student/teaching assistant at the University of Pennsylvania with an insatiable appetite for knowledge. Proficient in Javascript, HTML/CSS, Java, and familiar with Node.js, Passport.js, Git, GraphQL, and MongoDB. Willing to learn anything and everything.

Mental Health Advocate

I struggled with anorexia when I was in 8th/9th grade and sure, it was a mess but I've learned so much about the importance of self-care and love (I'm sorry this is cheesy). It's definitely something that has shaped me into a more positive and open-minded person.

Hole Foods Lover

Like, foods with a hole in the middle. I'm talking about bagels and donuts especially although I will not turn down cheerios once in a while!

Former Speech and Debater

As an avid debater throughout all of high school, I always thought I would major in econ, IR, political science, or something like that and then go pre-law. I discovered during first semester of college I wasn't actually interested in that path. Sooo welcome to my coded website!
